titles.title: Providing for the hour of meeting of the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/20/2004--Passed House without amendment. Fixes the daily hour of meeting for the House of Representatives for the second session of the 108th Congress. Sets the daily hour, until Monday, May 31,2004, at: (1) 2 p.m. on Mondays; (2) 12 noon on Tuesdays; and (3) 10 a.m. on all other days of the week. Sets the daily hour from Monday, May 31, 2004, until the end of the second session, at: (1) 12 noon on Mondays; (2) 10 a.m. on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Thursdays; and (3) 9 a.m. on all other days of the week.
